turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a pizza order with Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get four small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza, I would like it to be a veggie lover pizza with light sauce. On the second pizza, I would like it to be tomatoes only. On the third pizza, I would like it to be chicken barbecue with extra barbecue sauce. And on the fourth pizza, I would like it to be a pepperoni pizza. And on every pizza I would like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that Bella Luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small pizzas with extra cheese, 1 veggie lovers, light sauce, 1 tomatoes, 1 chicken bbq, extra sauce, and 1 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $56, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be everything, thank you.
